name: Race Against The Machine
description:
Welcome to my submission to the Boundless Game Jam 2021, Race Against The Machine.

 This is a One-Button racing game where you control the throttle of a white car with the space bar and try to cross the finish line first and with the best time possible.

The name is a pun (just a bad one) as the soundtrack for the game is chiptune covers of rage against the machine songs.  (These covers were created by me and come under fair use since they are remixes so they follow the jam rules)

The game has a customizable race with settings such as Number of laps, Ai difficulty and Number of other racers.

Please share your best times in the comments if you are happy with them.
